title: Scientific cook: stale tales
creator_credit: Rowena Golman, Channel 4 and A Stephens Kerr Production
brief_description: This video illustrates and discusses the answer to five scientific questions related to the principles of food preparation. 1. Why does bread go stale and what can be done to prevent this? 2. What makes a sponge cake light? 3. Why must bread dough be kneaded so much? 4. What effect does colour and texture have on the way meat should be cooked. 5. How do microwaves cook food?
